row.name: PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PRV.PROMPTSET.TEMPLATE.DOMIAN_PROJECT_DETAILS
row.description: It will ask Domain and Project name

row.xui: <dialog height="424" icon="PRPT" id="PRPTS" left="115" top="0" width="362"><readpanel fill="b" id="PRPTBOX" nl="1" scroll="v" text="Enter Domain Details"><properties><entry name="text">Enter Domain Details</entry><entry name="modifiable">0</entry></properties></readpanel></dialog>

row.name: UC4RB_HPQC_DOMAIN_NAME#
row.xui:
<combo alt="1" dynamic="1" enabled="1" fill="b" filter="0" focus="0" id="UC4RB_HPQC_DOMAIN_NAMEs.00" nl="1" strict="1" text="Domain" tooltip="HPQC Domain Name List" vtype="i"><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command owner="_self" owneraction="setsource" ownerparam="src|_dialog@src"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptcombolist" target="_self" targetaction="setlist" wait="0"/>
<properties> <entry listparam="" name="reference" reftype="XML">PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PRV.TEMPLATE.VARA.DOMAIN_DETAILS</entry> <entry name="xmlkey">&UC4RB_HPQC_DOMAIN_KEY_NAME#</entry> <entry name="xmlpath">//Domains/Domain/@Name</entry> <entry name="text">Domain</entry> <entry name="quotes"/> <entry name="id">UC4RB_HPQC_DOMAIN_NAMEs.00</entry> <entry name="dynamic">1</entry> <entry name="enabled">0</entry> <entry name="focus">0</entry> <entry name="tooltip">HPQC Domain Name List</entry> <entry name="modifiable">1</entry> <entry name="onchangereset"/> <entry name="customfield"/> <entry name="resetable">1</entry> <entry name="initvalue"/> </properties> </combo>

row.name: UC4RB_HPQC_PROJECT_NAME#
